name: Flubbie
description:
Show off your skills dodging moving obstacles, crossing the clouds and reaching the objective.

Get powers and use them wisely during your game.
Are you good enough? Do you know how to choose the right moment?
Enjoy several levels of increasing complexity until you reach the final goal.

Game Features:
- Compare your score with others with Google Play Services
- A network connection is NOT required to play.
- Casual game suitable for the whole family!

Enjoy!
